Name: sna-abdullahjmadini
Author: Abdullah J. M. Adini And Students

Translations.Text: Iti: “Imi varanda vangu avo vanozvikanganisira pachezvavo! Musave munoshaya tarisiro kubva mutsitsi dzaAllah. Zvirokwazvo Allah vanoregerera zvitadzo zvose. Zvirokwazvo, ndiwo muregereri, ane tsitsi dzose.”
“Uye tarirai mukukumbira rugerero uye nerukudzo nekuzvipira kwechokwadi kuna Tenzi venyu, mutongo usati wauya kwamuri, uye naizozvo hamuzombobatsirwi.”
“Uye teverai zvakanaka zveizvo zvatumirwa kwamuri kubva kuna Tenzi venyu, mutongo usati wauya kwamuri musina kutarisira!”
Apo munhu achati: “Kushushikana kwangu, ndange ndisingateereri Allah (handina kuita izvo zvakanzi naAllah ndiite), uye zvirokwazvo ndaive umwe weavo vaishora (chokwadi, Islaam)!”
Kana kuti anozoti: “Dai Allah vakanditungamirira, ndingadai ndiri umwe weavo vaitya (Allah).”
Kana kuti anozoti aona mutongo: “Dai ndakawana mukana (wekudzokera panyika), ndaizova umwe weavo vaiita mabasa akanaka.”
Hongu! Zvirokwazvo, zviratidzo zvangu zvakauya kwauri uye ukazviramba, uye ukazvitutumadza ukava umwe weavo vasingatendi
Uye zuva rekutongwa uchaona avo vainyepera Allah zviso zvavo zvichange zvakasviba. Hamuna here nzvimbo muGehena yeavo vaizvitutumadza
Uye Allah vachanunura vatsvene vovapinza nzvimbo dzavo dzebudiriro (Paradhiso). Zvakaipa hazvizombovabati kana kusuruvara
Allah ndivo musiki wezvose, uye ndivo mumiririri (muchengetedzi) wezvinhu zvose
Kwavari ndiko kune svumbunuro dzematenga nepasi. Uye avo vasingatendi muzviratidzo zvaAllah, ivavo ndivo vachange vakarasikirwa
